item.title: Construction & Renovation Portfolio
item.description:
Overview

Since 2019, I’ve gained extensive hands-on construction experience through my family’s renovation business, developing expertise in residential electrical installation, hardwood flooring, bathroom remodeling, and general construction techniques. This practical experience has honed my problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, and project management skillsâ€”all directly applicable to hardware engineering and systems integration.

Core Competencies

Skill Area Experience Level Years
Electrical Installation Advanced 6+ years
Hardwood Flooring Expert 6+ years
Bathroom Remodeling Intermediate 5+ years
Tile Installation Intermediate 4+ years
Drywall & Finishing Advanced 5+ years
Project Management Intermediate 6+ years

Major Projects

1. Complete Home Electrical Rewiring

Location: Las Vegas, NV
Duration: 3 months
Role: Lead Electrician Assistant
